metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2013:1455-1 -- Recommended update for multipath-tools
metadata.description:
This update for multipath-tools provides the following fixes:
* Specify checker_timeout in seconds. (bnc#824913) * Fix setting of fast_io_fail_tmo. (bnc#824148) * Reset queue_if_no_path if flush failed. (bnc#828868) * Document 'wwids_file' and 'reservation_key'. (bnc#820899) * Correctly display 'timeout' checker status. * Fix typo in retain_attached_hw_handler. * Do not print 'path is up' for removed paths. (bnc#789239) * Proactively remove path. (bnc#789239) * Do not call tur in sync mode if pthread_cancel fails. (bnc#832796)
